content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data'
    ) AS [result]


-- Identify the interred data types
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/'',
        FORMAT = ''PARQUET'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data''
    ) AS [result]
'
